reasoning: ATLL caused by HTLV-1 infection. Global incidence ~0.3 per 100k but highly variable: <0.01 in non-endemic areas, 3-5 per 100k in endemic regions (southwestern Japan, Caribbean). Using global weighted average.
source: Proietti FA et al. Global epidemiology of HTLV-I infection and associated diseases. Oncogene. 2005;24(39):6058-68
